articles.title: Physical modeling for pure data (PMPD) and real-time interaction with an audio synthesis

title: tLine2D
description: The `tLine2D` object defines a 2D line segment using two points and tracks the position of a "mass" relative to it. It outputs the mass's distance from the segment, a related "speed" value, and a binary (0 or 1) indicator based on the mass's position. This object is primarily used for testing and interacting with 2D mass positions within a defined linear boundary.
